data.title: Marcia A. Mcdonald Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Marcia A. McDonald, age 86, a resident of Frankfort formerly of Park Forest and University Park, passed away on Tuesday, August 31, 2021 at Brookdale  in Orland Park. She is sur...
data.text: Marcia A. McDonald, age 86, a resident of Frankfort formerly of Park Forest and University Park, passed away on Tuesday, August 31, 2021 at Brookdale in Orland Park. She is survived by her loving family, children Linda (Ron) Rekruciak and Lora Hansen; sisters Carolyn (Paul) Lechlitner; grandchildren Danielle (Eric) Custardo, Stephanie Parise, Ryan (Kristen) Rekruciak, Whitney Hansen, Courtney (John) Sharpe and Lindsey (Adam) Miller and 7 great grandchildren. She was preceded in death by her husbands, Franklin Hoover and Willian McDonald and a sister Barbara and Duane Graff. She was a member of Milford Christian Church in Milford IN, Deer Creek Christian Church in University Park IL and the order of Eastern Star in Milford, IN for 58 years. A visitation will be held at Kurtz Memorial Chapel, 65 Old Frankfort Way, Frankfort IL 60423 on Friday, September 3, 2021 from 4:00 PM until 8:00 PM. A graveside service will be held at Felkner Cemetery in Milford, IN on Saturday, September 4, 2021 at 12:30 PM. In lieu of flowers memorial donations to P.A.W.S. in Marcia's name would be appreciated. .
